newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA NOON RADIO HEADLINES- JULY 28.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA NOON RADIO HEADLINES- JULY 28.

text.p: Here are the main headlines from Lithuania's M-1 Plus radio station's noon news report on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Workers are reparing damaged railway tracks near the port of Klaipeda where two wagons carrying oil derailed on Sunday.
- The transport ministry has begun negotiations with the Cyprus communications ministry aimed at sealing an agreement on the international transit of goods and passengers between the two states.
